_header: Saint Luke in his gospel bringeth us to mind
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Annunciation, feast of
_description: ‘Euangelium Missus est angelus Gabriel’ (Feast of the Annunciation) — forty-one lines in couplets

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Seynt luk in hys godspel bryngeth ous to mundeHou godes sone of hoeuene com tok oure kunde…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Of oure leuedy marie þys ys seynt lukes laȝTo hoeuene hoe make ous stye at oure ende daȝ
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written by original hand to right of title, f. 211)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Euangelium Missus est angelus Gabriel (Rubric title centered above text, f. 211)
